messages.content:
Web VR A-Frame world with random sky color, random floor color, 10 randomly colored random size rectangular objects as buildings. Random string is updated once every .01 seconds. 10 very small spheres with text string labels update once every 1 seconds using color, position and text content information from the random string. the random string data displays in white in the top middle. display is updated once per second.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Web VR A-Frame world with random sky color, random floor color, 10 randomly colored random size rectangular objects as buildings, with random black or yellow rectangle on the sides as windows. Random string is updated once every 10 seconds. 10 very small spheres with text string labels update once every 100 seconds using color, position and text content information from the random string. the random string data displays in white in the top
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Random string updated once every 10 seconds. 10 spheres with text string labels update once every 100 seconds using color, position and text content information from random string. random string data displays in white at top. display updated once per
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
